title: I wasn't inting
body:
I am SOOO sick of when these meanies report me for inting or post on the boards calling stuff inting.

How am I supposed to know I shouldn't try to 1v1 a 10/0/0 lvl 12 master yi as a lvl 8 0/7/1 janna? I don't know I won't win until I try.

Or another game - I was playing quinn top and saw a low hp enemy bard, so I flashed into a 2v5 with my jungler... and got deleted by their malz ult into mf ult and idk, some random damage from the other two members while bard ran away. Like, I was just trying to grab a kill on the bard who was 1 hit from dead - you can't fault me for diving in 2v5.

Or... my third game. I died 1v1 to darius when he level 2 all-in killed me by popping ghost and flash and chasing me down the lane. I tried to flash away, but I still died. So I went back to lane, tried to kill him as level 2 irelia vs lvl 4 darius. I died. So then I tried to 1v1 him a third time lvl 4 irelia vs lvl 6 darius and I was even close to winning cuz he'd stayed after killing me lvl 4, but 10 sec after my team started spam pinging me, his jg showed up and killed me with darius. So I immediately tp'd back to the lane hit level 5 and tried to 1v1 cleaver, ninja tabi level 7 darius vs my level 5 boots of swiftness, doran blade, corrupting potion irelia... and he killed me again. I then spent 20 min farming top 1v0 while darius ran around killing my whole team and our mid inhib. I died every time the enemy 0/4/0 zed came top to duel me and farm the wave. I didn't get any towers. And I didn't come to teamfight even when we COULD have won a 5v5 off the back of my fed midlaner if only I'd helped... because I needed farm. I even caught up in cs to the darius by the time they were destroying our nexus. So really I did a great job and it was my stupid team's fault for not camping darius all game and holding towers 5v4 vs a darius 3 levels and 2 items ahead of everyone else - they're why we lost. And did I mention how rude they were?

But most of all, I wasn't feeding or inting in any of those games because... I said I wasn't and the ~~intentional feeders~~ unlucky players on the boards like me making HONEST mistakes upvoted me. Pls upvote this and help me get all those toxic players crying "inting" banned - cuz they're mean and and and... they have no right to assume that I'm inting just because I'm 0/30/2. I have TWO assists - so I'm CLEARLY trying and playing for the team. And just because I was only ganked ONE time and had counterpicked my lane opponent and gotten 20 ganks from my team doesn't mean I should win lane or not die ya know. I was just unlucky all those times. Just honest mistakes that somehow get me a bunch of toxic hate from my team... like telling me to "group the fuck up" or "ward pls" or "hug tower and just farm please". Like I can realistically be expected to do those things. And like not doing them is going to cost us the game lol. What a bunch of toxic noobs.{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Trash will trash. Their reports dont do anything except trigger a review, and being punished for feeding takes some very strong evidence.
Lol - apparently everyone misses the joke. I'm being sarcastic. Pointing out the stupidity and complete lack of logic of people who argue that stuff isn't inting by saying all their dumb excuses.
That's why I put this in "meme's and games". Dry sarcasm poking fun at all the people who talk like that and actually believe the bullcrap coming out of their mouth.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
